purpose: The email announces the 22nd International Conference on Managed Programming Languages & Runtimes (MPLR'25), inviting submissions of research papers, work-in-progress papers, and industry/tool papers. It outlines the topics of interest, submission categories, and author instructions, including formatting requirements and important deadlines. The conference aims to provide a platform for discussing novel results in managed programming languages and runtime systems, with a focus on various applications from embedded systems to cloud computing.

The 22nd International Conference on Managed Programming Languages & Runtimes
MPLR 2025 submissions must conform to the ACM Policy on Prior Publication
Please consider submitting to the SPLASH poster track.
